languages.text: "Пусть Орден составит список задокументированных чудес, связанных с Горнилом, для защиты своей позиции".
"The Order should make a list of all the documented miracles involving the Crucible to argue their case."
languages.original_text: "Пусть Орден составит список задокументированных чудес, связанных с Горнилом, для защиты своей позиции".

traits.locale_text: "The Order should make a list of the documented miracles connected to the Crucible to defend their case."
"The Order should make a list of the documented miracles connected to the Crucible to defend their case."
"The Order should make a list of all the documented miracles involving the Crucible to argue their case."
"The Order should make a list of the documented miracles connected to the Crucible to defend their case."
"The Order should make a list of the documented miracles connected to the Crucible to defend their case."
"The Order should make a list of all the documented miracles involving the Crucible to argue their case."
"The Order should make a list of all the documented miracles involving the Crucible to argue their case."
"The Order should make a list of all the documented miracles involving the Crucible to argue their case."

languages.text: “修会应该给出一份清单，列出档案里记载过的、与熔炉有关的奇迹显现，来为自己进行辩护。”
languages.original_text: "The Order should make a list of the documented miracles connected to the Crucible to defend their case."

traits.locale_text: “修会应该给出一份清单，列出档案里记载过的、与熔炉有关的奇迹显现，来为自己进行辩护。”
“修会应该给出一份清单，列出档案里记载过的、与熔炉有关的奇迹显现，来为自己进行辩护。”

languages.text: «La Orden debería hacer una lista de los milagros documentados relacionados con el Crisol para defender su caso».
languages.original_text: "The Order should make a list of the documented miracles connected to the Crucible to defend their case."

traits.locale_text: «La Orden debería hacer una lista de los milagros documentados relacionados con el Crisol para defender su caso».

languages.text: 「修道会は、坩堝に関連する奇跡を記録したリストを作成し、自分たちの事例を弁護せねばならない」
languages.original_text: "The Order should make a list of the documented miracles connected to the Crucible to defend their case."

traits.locale_text: 「修道会は、坩堝に関連する奇跡を記録したリストを作成し、自分たちの事例を弁護せねばならない」
「修道会は、坩堝に関連する奇跡を記録したリストを作成し、自分たちの事例を弁護せねばならない」

languages.text: « L'Ordre devrait dresser une liste de tous les miracles documentés et liés au Creuset afin de la verser à son dossier. »
languages.original_text: "The Order should make a list of all the documented miracles involving the Crucible to argue their case."

traits.locale_text: « L'Ordre devrait dresser une liste de tous les miracles documentés et liés au Creuset afin de la verser à son dossier. »

languages.text: "Der Orden sollte eine Liste der dokumentierten Wunder anfertigen, die mit dem Tiegel im Zusammenhang stehen."
languages.original_text: "The Order should make a list of the documented miracles connected to the Crucible to defend their case."

traits.locale_text: "Der Orden sollte eine Liste der dokumentierten Wunder anfertigen, die mit dem Tiegel im Zusammenhang stehen."
"Der Orden sollte eine Liste der dokumentierten Wunder anfertigen, die mit dem Tiegel im Zusammenhang stehen."

languages.text: "Tarikat, iddiasını ortaya koymak için Pota ile alakalı, belgelenmiş tüm mucizelerin bir listesini yapmalı."
languages.original_text: "The Order should make a list of all the documented miracles involving the Crucible to argue their case."

traits.locale_text: "Tarikat, iddiasını ortaya koymak için Pota ile alakalı, belgelenmiş tüm mucizelerin bir listesini yapmalı."
